summary: Project now includes a strict branding requirement to use only the user-provided/attached logo file and no other logo assets.
architectural_notes: Branding constraint: the app must use only the user-provided (attached) logo file; no fallback/default/alternate logos permitted.
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- EYEGIC logo image (EYEGIC LOGO for ID cards-5.dim_1536x1024.png)

existing_features.title: Add the user-uploaded logo image file "EYEGIC LOGO for ID cards-5.png" to the frontend as a static asset and use this exact image as the only logo image used anywhere in the app.
Implement a reusable BrandLogo component that renders the uploaded logo image, and replace the text-based brand rendering in the site header and footer with the BrandLogo component.

Remove/avoid any remaining logo-related logic or references that would cause another logo to appear (including generated placeholder logos, previously bundled logo assets, or logo-management UI/hooks/utilities), while keeping existing settings routes for logo management disabled/absent.

new_feature_requests.summary: Use only the logo file attached by the user; do not use any other logo anywhere in the app/build.

projectName: Use only the uploaded EYEGIC logo file across the app
